activationBanner.title: Your digital documents always with you!
activationBanner.description: Activate the Wallet to keep your digital identity and personal documents on your device.

walletInstanceCreation.title: Your digital documents at your fingertips
walletInstanceCreation.description:
###### How it works 
 Wallet allows you to save and keep on your device the digital version of your Identity and some of the physical documents you already own.  

 ###### It's easy and fast 
 You can authenticate yourself in Italy and abroad for many digital services, or verify your credentials in person by showing the QR code linked to the digital versions of your documents.

preview.title: Digital Idenitity:
preview.subtitle: Here's a preview of your data

success.title: It's all ready!
success.subtitle: You can now add your documents and access online services.

list.title: What would you like to add to the Wallet?

trust.title: {{credential}}: Required Data
trust.subtitle: The data will be shared with the **{{authority}}** for the issuance of the digital version of the document.

disclaimer.store: Your data is secure and will only be processed for the purposes described in the Privacy Notice.
disclaimer.retention: The data will only be shared for the time necessary to issue the digital version of the document.

failure.title: An unexpected error occurred
failure.subtitle: Your request to the issuing entity was not successful.
